question.qText: Which of the following is the MOST likely reason why Britain had the largest empire in Africa by 1914?

aBtn.aText: Britain had the largest population in Europe and could field the largest land army in battle.
Britain was geographically closer to Africa than were other European powers.
Britain’s political system was historically unstable and used imperialism to distract the public’s attention.
Britain created a military alliance with France and the two countries cooperated in conquering Africa.
Britain was the first to industrialize and had the world’s most powerful navy.
